item.title: Native > Flutter > React Native
item.description: This blog is aimed at people who haven’t heard of flutter and would like to take a shallow dive into it Many of you already would have heard about this new Google’s framework. It was proposed and the beta was released a few weeks back. It is a framework in development. If you haven’t heard of it, then the next sentence I am going to tell will mostly make you close this post
